list.name: Do commit
list.comment: Passing the localport to the openport servers. Fixing the sys.exit calls in the openport_api module Passing whether the session was automatically restarted

option.name: myStatusName
option.value: Will be merged with property conflicts

task.summary: Default task
renamed file
You can now share a file from the menu bar
You can now share ports from the menu bar
fallback ssh port 443 (for firewalls)
better storing and passing of the restart command. Also hiding some black command screens.
api changed in python 2.7
fallback ssh port 443 (for firewalls)
Fixed the samePort integration test
Passing the server so the client can connect to the test server.
added extra integration test for http forwarding
Fixed test for the http forwarding

Added integration tests for http forwarding It's now possible to run the tray on different ports Starting the tray from the app is more robust Better logging
Fixed formatting
fixed integration tests
Added extra integration tests to test the handling of new keys
Moved the gui and manager to separate modules
Added listing and killing of shares via the command line + registering keys via a token
Added selenium tests to check the interaction with the site regarding keys and sessions
Renamed test files and added unittest2 requirement
Replaced the http server from the manager with the bottle framework. Some test improvements.
Added test to check that the manager is properly killing the child processes Another app test for checking http forward
Fixed problem with hanging tests
Better cleaning of the tests
Stripping the sudo command if the user running the manager is the same as the user that started the share.
Moved hudson script to separate file
Made the tests a bit more robust
Don't run xargs if the lines are empty
Fixed problem with tests launching too many openport processes
More fixing the tests
More fixing the tests
Added installation script for the packages required by the tests
Added screenshots to debug the site_interaction_tests
Fail test, don't raise error
On error, the build should still produce test reports
Using nose tests to generate xml output
Fixed tests by given the manager more time to shut down + upgraded the phantomjs driver
Added script to create exe's + some changes to make the exe's cleaner
Better handling of connection resets by peer
Some cleaning up of the executables: You can now do "openport 22" added --kill-all to the manager fixed issue with restarting shares on the same port
removing the share from the local shares when the share stops
Put the manager app inside the openport app with the command 'manager' eg <openport manager --list>
Restarting shares is now OFF by default. For the app AND the manager.
Fixed windows - linux problems (I hope). Automatically request same server_port for same localport.
Fixed more tests
Fixing nonblockread test
More testfixing
Fixed failing test
Should fix timing issue in DBHandler
Found problem with restarting killed sessions. Created a new test to show the problem.
Passing the localport to the openport servers. Fixing the sys.exit calls in the openport_api module Passing whether the session was automatically restarted
